knimeNode.name: Keras to TensorFlow Network Converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a Keras deep learning model with TensorFlow backend to a TensorFlow model.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a Keras deep learning model with TensorFlow backend to a TensorFlow model. TensorFlow models can be executed using the TensorFlow Java API which is usually faster then using a Python kernel to execute the model via the Keras Python API.
